Ratings.comment: Graded almost everything complete/incomplete. Didn't grade anything from the first couple weeks until towards the very end of the semester. Grading was inconsistent also. Extra credit made available. Easy assignments.

Can tell she is trying to help.Diligent. No textbook but a lot of scanned readings. Some readings are hard to understand and quiz questions sometimes a little bit confusing (they are relatively easy though)put effort in = good grade. So far OK.
